fullText: Under George C. Wolfe's direction, O'Neill's epic feels less like an endurance test than a gripping investigation of American disillusionment.
dtliExcerpt: Under George C. Wolfe's direction, O'Neill's epic feels less like an endurance test than a gripping investigation of American disillusionment.
